trans-unit.source: Goal 1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
trans-unit.target: Goal 1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

trans-unit.source: Goal 4: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
trans-unit.target: Goal 4: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

trans-unit.source: Goal 5: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
trans-unit.target: Goal 5: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

trans-unit.source: Goal 6: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
trans-unit.target: Goal 6: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

trans-unit.source: Goal 7: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
trans-unit.target: Goal 7: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

trans-unit.source: Goal 8: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
trans-unit.target: Goal 8: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

trans-unit.source: Goal 10: Reduce inequality within and among countries
trans-unit.target: Goal 10: Reduce inequality within and among countries

trans-unit.source: Goal 11: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
trans-unit.target: Goal 11: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

trans-unit.source: Goal 14: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
trans-unit.target: Goal 14: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

trans-unit.source: Goal 17: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
trans-unit.target: Goal 17: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
